summary: The diff does not provide direct evidence of the required footer-only copyright line in `frontend/src/App.tsx` (footer area is truncated). The diff does show unrequested header/navigation changes (e.g., added “Popular Tools”/priority tools logic), which conflicts with the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the site footer to remove all platform branding and display only the exact text: "© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved." (no other footer elements or outbound links).
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/src/App.tsx` is truncated before the footer portion, so the diff summary does not contain verifiable evidence that the footer renders exactly the required single line and removes all caffeine.ai branding/linking.

hallucinated_features.description: Header/navigation enhancements including a 'priorityTools' list ("Popular Tools" links) and related navigation changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goals: do not change header/navigation; the diff shows new header logic and tool link collections not requested by REQ-1.
